attributes.action: allow it to be easier for 17 to 21 year olds to apply for council flats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there is age discrimination when yougsters apply for flats of the council for one you need to be at least 18 which should be 17 and they are never offered first choice of vacant accomodations with in serten areas of England
